brand_identity.name: Armin Shopfitting
brand_identity.tagline: Precision in Every Beam. Artistry in Every Space.
brand_identity.target_audience: Property Developers, Commercial Retail Owners, Real Estate Investors

design_system.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Clean, Architectural) with Dark Mode Sections for Impact

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle concrete grain overlay on light backgrounds

hero_section.structure: High-impact typography overlaying a darkened architectural image. Use 'Tetris' grid logic.
elements: CTA: Solid Orange Button with Arrow Icon

services_section.structure: Grid of 3 cards. One large (Construction), two smaller (Analysis, Refurbishing).
services_section.card_style: White bg, heavy border, hover:translate-x-1 hover:translate-y-1 transition-all

portfolio_section.structure: Large project images with overlay text on hover.

testimonials_section.structure: Minimalist text-focused cards. Large quote marks in Accent Color.

contact_section.structure: Left: Contact Info (Dark Bg). Right: Form (Light Bg).
contact_section.form_style: Input fields with bottom border only (Architectural sketch style).

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (ArrowRight, Hammer, Ruler, HardHat).

component_instructions.buttons: Sharp edges (rounded-none). Primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white. Secondary: Border-2 border-slate-900 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-900 hover:text-white.
component_instructions.cards: No shadow by default. Add 'shadow-[6px_6px_0px_0px_rgba(15,23,42,1)]' on hover. Border-2 border-slate-900.
component_instructions.inputs: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-slate-300 focus:border-orange-500 focus:outline-none px-0 py-4 rounded-none transition-colors
component_instructions.navbar: Glassmorphism: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200. Sticky.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
DO NOT use gradients for text or backgrounds. Stick to solid, bold colors.
Typography must be responsive: text-4xl on mobile, text-6xl+ on desktop.
Avoid 'Inter' font. Use the specified Google Fonts.
Images must have alt text for accessibility.
